description:
Get groovy on the slopes in these Women's Ski Full Cushion Tie Dye Print Over the Calf Socks. Featuring Indestructawool technology for enhanced durability, a Virtually Seamless toe for enhanced comfort, and 4 Degree elite fit system for a peak-performance fit, plus body-mapped mesh zones for added breathability. And with cushion all-around the foot, it provides all-day comfort that never gives up. Far out!

  • Indestructawool™ technology for enhanced durability
  • 4 Degree™ elite fit system for a dialed-in, performance-oriented fit
  • Body-mapped mesh zones for added breathability
  • Wider welt for secure fit and comfort
  • Virtually Seamless™ toe for enhanced comfort
  • Women's specific fit: narrower heel and slimmer fit
name: Smartwool Ski Full Cushion Tie Dye Print OTC Socks - Women's
